name: Cyberon
description:
CYBERON

Developed by:

Programming                                                                         
Boyan Yotov                                                  
Animesh Sharma

Art 
Gurharman Singh

Design 
Shuaizhou Guan

Cyberon provides the player with thought provoking experience to progress in puzzle based levels. It is a 3D game staged inside a neon virtual world in which the player controls a robot-character and he has to surreptitiously avoid the enemies to escape the world and his only arsenal is hacking and gathering resources.  The game provides him with five levels with difficulties ranging from easy to hard.  Enjoy escaping!

Special Thanks to :
Martin Lynagh
Fraser Simpson
Dayna Galloway
Finlay Pearston

SFX - Mike Koenig (http://soundbible.com/)
